hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sulaiman bin Buraidah, from his father, that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“The people of Paradise are one hundred and twenty ranks, eighty from this nation and forty from all other nations.”

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ أُمَّةِ مُحَمَّدٍ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: Description of the Nation of Muhammad (ﷺ)
